alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 24 at 11:56PM EDT until September 25 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR CENTRAL MIAMI-DADE COUNTY... At 1156 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near The Redland, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Florida City, Naranja, Princeton, Richmond West, Country Walk, Goulds, Leisure City, The Hammocks, Cutler Bay, Inlikita, and South Miami Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
